description: NTS Map: 092G02Another nice but easy walk that can be done all year round, donated by a senior hiker (one of the original members of the North Shore Hikers) who is providing us a collection of easy hikes and walks.
directions: In Burnaby, take Byrne Road S from Marine Way all the way to the river front and there wil lbe a parking lot in Fraser Park.
title: Fraser River Walk
